title.narrative: Cooperatives to Strengthen Youth Empowerment and Employment Readiness among Vulnerable, Marginalised and At-Risk Groups

description.narrative: The overall objective of this project is to improve employment opportunities for vulnerable, marginalised and at-risk youth. The project objective is to build institutional capacities to deliver innovative and value added services with a special focus on employment readiness/foundational skills, empowerment, and cooperatives development. The expected impact will be measured at the program level through benchmarking to assess whether direct beneficiary have improved services to promote youth employment. In addition, the project will undertake impact evaluations of selected programs/services to assess the extent to which the intervention has improved youth employment outcomes.

participating-org.narrative: Japan, Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 4.2. Strengthened capacity of enterprises to adopt new business models, technology and techniques to enhance productivity and sustainability
